companies.name: Apple
companies.description: Apple Inc. is an American multinational technology company headquartered in Cupertino, California that designs, develops, and sells consumer electronics, computer software, and online services.

companies.name: Microsoft
companies.description: Microsoft Corporation is an American multinational technology company with headquarters in Redmond, Washington.

companies.name: Google
companies.description: Google is an American multinational technology company that specializes in Internet-related services and products. These include online advertising technologies, search, cloud computing, software, and hardware.
